  • Method Details

    • addHead

      @ShellMethod("Adds a new station at the beginning of the metro line") public String addHead(@ShellOption(help="Name of the metro line") String line, @ShellOption(help="Name of the metro station") String station, @ShellOption(help="Travel time to the next station in minutes") int time)

    • append

      @ShellMethod("Adds a new station at the end of the line") public String append(@ShellOption(help="Name of the metro line") String line, @ShellOption(help="Name of the metro station") String station, @ShellOption(help="Travel time to the next station in minutes") int time)

    • connect

      @ShellMethod("Adds a transfer connection between two metro stations") public String connect(@ShellOption(help="Name of the first metro line") String sourceLine, @ShellOption(help="Name of the first metro station") String sourceStation, @ShellOption(help="Name of the second metro line") String targetLine, @ShellOption(help="Name of the second metro station") String targetStation)

    • route

      @ShellMethod("Finds and prints the shortest route between two metro stations") public String route(@ShellOption(help="Name of the starting metro line") String sourceLine, @ShellOption(help="Name of the starting metro station") String sourceStation, @ShellOption(help="Name of the final metro line") String targetLine, @ShellOption(help="Name of the final metro station") String targetStation)

    • fastestRoute

      @ShellMethod("Finds and prints the fastest route between two metro stations") public String fastestRoute(@ShellOption(help="Name of the starting metro line") String sourceLine, @ShellOption(help="Name of the starting metro station") String sourceStation, @ShellOption(help="Name of the final metro line") String targetLine, @ShellOption(help="Name of the final metro station") String targetStation)

    • remove

      @ShellMethod("Removes a station from the metro map") public String remove(@ShellOption(help="Name of the metro line") String line, @ShellOption(help="Name of the metro station") String station)

    • output

      @ShellMethod("Outputs all stations for a given metro line") public org.springframework.shell.table.Table output(@ShellOption(help="Name of the metro line") String line)

    • lines

      @ShellMethod("Prints information about metro lines") public org.springframework.shell.table.Table lines()

    • printRoute

      public String printRoute(List<StationId> route)

      @Autowired public void setRepository(MetroRepository repository)

      @Autowired @Qualifier("shortestAlgorithm") public void setShortest(SearchAlgorithm<StationId> shortest)
